de.awi.floenavigation.aismessages

Class AISMessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.awi.floenavigation.aismessages.AISMessageReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AISMessageReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    It runs on a separate thread. It is called from the NetworkMonitor when the ping request between the tablet and the AIS Server is successful. It takes care of establishing socket connection with the Wifi Network of the AIS transponder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.BufferedReader bufferedReader
      To initialize input stream reader
      private org.apache.commons.net.telnet.TelnetClient client
      Used to establish telnet client connection
      private android.content.Context context
      Stores the context of the application
      private java.lang.String dstAddress
      This variable stores the ip address of the AIS Transponder to which the tablet is connected over Wifi You can change the value of the variable in GridSetupActivity.dstAddress
      private int dstPort
      This variable stores the port number of the AIS transponder You can change the value of the variable in GridSetupActivity.dstPort
      (package private) boolean isConnected
      Flag to store the status of client connection
      private boolean mDisconnectFlag
      The flag receives its value from NetworkMonitor Used to disconnect the client connection when the ping request is unsuccessful with the AIS transponder
      private java.lang.String packet
      Stores the packet received from the buffered reader on the basis of AIVDM and AIVDO
      private android.content.BroadcastReceiver reconnectReceiver
      Broadcast receiver to receive intent packets from NetworkMonitor
      (package private) java.lang.StringBuilder responseString
      Used to store the read lines from the buffered reader
      private static boolean stopDecoding
      Flag to stop decoding AIS packets, set from SyncActivity Triggered when Synchronization with the server is in progress.
      private static java.lang.String TAG 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AISMessageReceiver(java.lang.String addr, int port, android.content.Context con)
      Default constructor to initialize broadcast receiver Object created from NetworkMonitor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Overides the run method of the runnable, which is continuously executed that helps in setting up the client connection and reading the input stream from the buffered reader and thereby filtering on the basis of AIVDM and AIVDO packets and calling the AISDecodingService to decode the ASCII packet
      static void setStopDecoding(boolean stopAISDecoding)
      Function for the setting the value

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AISMessageReceiver

        public AISMessageReceiver(java.lang.String addr,
                          int port,
                          android.content.Context con)
        Default constructor to initialize broadcast receiver Object created from NetworkMonitor
        Parameters:
        addr - Sets the ip address of the AIS transponder
        port - Sets the port number of the AIS transponder
        con - Sets the context of the Activity from which this object is initialized

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Overides the run method of the runnable, which is continuously executed that helps in setting up the client connection and reading the input stream from the buffered reader and thereby filtering on the basis of AIVDM and AIVDO packets and calling the AISDecodingService to decode the ASCII packet
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setStopDecoding

        public static void setStopDecoding(boolean stopAISDecoding)
        Function for the setting the value
        Parameters:
        stopAISDecoding - flag received from SyncActivity to stop the decoding when the sync activity is in progress
